title: Variables
summary: Variables store values so you can reuse them later. They have names and types; in many languages you can reassign them and use them in expressions.
sample_question: What is a variable and why is it useful?

title: Loops
summary: Loops let you repeat an action multiple times. For-loops repeat a fixed number of times; while-loops repeat while a condition holds.
sample_question: Explain the difference between a for loop and a while loop.
